extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite of CISC324 or ELEC377 and registered in a BSCE Academic Program or a SODE-P-BCH or SODE-P-BSH Academic Plan.

basic.description: Analytic and empirical evaluation of the performance of software systems. Performance modeling. Experimental design and statistical techniques for empirical performance analysis. Alternately offered as CISC 437/3.0.
basic.subject: SOFT
basic.title: Performance Analysis
